authorizeAdapterCall(address,address,byt.notice: Authorizes an adapter call based on parameters

isAllowedSource(address,address).notice: Checks if a source is allowed for a specific token

isAllowedSpender(address,address).notice: Checks if a spender is allowed for a specific token

maxSingleTransfer(address).notice: Gets the maximum amount allowed for a single transfer

setAllowedSource(address,address,bool).notice: Sets whether a source is allowed for a specific token

setAllowedSpender(address,address,bool).notice: Sets whether a spender is allowed for a specific token
